channel.title: Where to find FULL summoning?
channel.description:
I've found several tutorials to Summoning on here, but I'm looking for a tutorial for FULL summoning on a PI 317. Including the tab, the BoB, and the Summoning Orb.
Could anyone provide me with some links to this?

item.title: Where to find FULL summoning?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Just use the search function on the site. If nothing comes up, try rune-server. I doubt there’s going to be a FULL tutorial like you ask that would work well, but hey it’s worth a shot.

Read full topic
